Pre-Game Insights: Phillies fans were hopeful and engaged before Game 1, with activities like tailgating and rally towels waving.
Fans expressed confidence in the team's ability to bounce back despite the loss, emphasizing the resilience of the city and team.
Post-Match Reflections: Fans were disappointed with the loss but remained optimistic, emphasizing that the series isn't over and the team will come back.
Some fans noted the lack of run support and bullpen performance but remained hopeful for future games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans were dressed in red and showed strong support, highlighting the team's connection with the city.
The team planned a block party for before Game 2 to boost fan energy and provide rally towels.
